DOC.brief_title: Caregiver Outlook : An Intervention Improve Caregiving Serious Illness
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator propose randomize control trial evaluate intervention end-of-life preparation completion Veterans caregiver end-of-life . Specific aim 1 ) Evaluate impact caregiver Outlook intervention caregiver anxiety , depression , anticipatory grief , completion , burden ; 2 ) Evaluate impact home versus hospital , emergency department , nurse facility ; 3 ) Evaluate impact intervention session 's qualitative content , examine variation associate select demographic variable , quality family communication , stage illness change . Caregivers first group ( `` treatment '' ) meet facilitator three time period forty-five minute . In first session , subject ask discus issue relate relationship life review . In session two , participant ask speak depth issue regret forgiveness . In final session , subject focus legacy celebration . Caregivers second group ( `` attention control '' ) meet facilitator three time period forty-five minute ask listen non-guided relaxation CD participate guide relaxation exercise . Participants group receive pre post-test measure administer blind interviewer . Outcome measure measure Functional Assessment Cancer Therapy - General ( FACT-G ) , Quality life scale , FACIT-sp sub-scale , Anticipatory Grief Scale , Caregiver Reaction Assessment , Qual-E completion preparation sub-scales , patient day home .
